Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Long Sochenda  069 477 236/ 078 202 333 KT 4 floors, # 23, street 112, sangkat Phsar Depo 3, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh.  069 477 236/ 078 202 333

Company Profile:
New Gateway International School(GIS)
We initiate the education of our students at their level of preparedness by providing the highest quality learning experiences we can provide that lead to the success of everyone involved, especially the targeted success of students.

We focus our efforts on academic preparation for all of our students and professional or career preparation when such an emphasis is suitable. We emphasize the success of our students in ways that fit their needs and goals. Practical applications of learning will build confidence among students about their competence in various capacities.

We promote language familiarity and mastery, mathematics, science, history, social sciences, physical education, the arts, and other disciplines as integral parts of their curriculum.

OUR MISSION
To prepare a generation of thinking and committed citizens who are capable of contributing towards Cambodia’s continued growth and prosperity. Constantly revisiting the curriculum to ensure that the skills and knowledge taught in our school meets the challenges of the 21st century. New Gateway International School empowers students to achieve educational, professional, and personal success through lifelong learning in our dynamic and original school. Students will be prepared for living successfully as future leaders and responsible caring members of Cambodian society. We provide specialized, comprehensive, and supportive educational experiences, foster academic integrity, and encourage lifelong learning.

CURRICULUM
NGIS curriculum aims to nurture each child to his/her full potential, to discover their talents and to develop in them a passion for life-long learning. Students go through a broad range of experiences to develop the skills and values that they will need for life. The broad-based curriculum imparts literacy, numeracy, bilingualism, the sciences, humanities, aesthetics, physical education, civics and moral education, and National Education.

Job Description:
F & B Manager manages all F&B operations and delivers an excellent guest experience. He/she forecasts, plans and manages all F&B orders, staff and finance. The goal is to maximize sales and revenue through customer satisfaction and employee engagement.F & B Manager also responsible for below tasks:

- Manage all F&B and day-to-day operations within budgeted guidelines and to the highest standards
- Preserve excellent levels of internal and external customer service
- Identify customers needs and respond proactively to all of their concerns
- Lead F&B team by attracting, recruiting, training and appraising talented personnel
- Comply with all health and safety regulations
- Report on management regarding sales results and productivity
Job Requirement:
- At least 5 years of food and beverage management experience
- Comprehensive English communication skill both spoken and written
- Ability to spot and resolve problems efficiently
- Mastery in delegating multiple tasks
- Outstanding Communication and leadership skills
- Ability to manage personnel and meet financial targets

job title: Resident Host or Senior Resident Host (Guest Relation)
position: Resident Host or Senior Resident Host (Guest Relation)
Job Description:
You are responsible for:

- Liaising directly with guests and relevant departments to ensure their well-being, comfort, satisfaction and that perfection of service is attained. 
- Greeting all guests and all patrons in a warm and welcoming manner of Borei Angkor Resort & Spa 
- Conversing with the Front Office System’s operation and to maintain the computer discipline at all times
- Liaising closely with Housekeeping regarding room allocations, early arrivals, VIP arrivals, group arrivals, room changes, early departures, request for cots and any other accommodation request
- Adhering to the hotel standards
- Dealing with guest's inquiries, problems or complaints in an efficient and professional manner without detriment to the Resort and/or its reputation
Job Requirement:
Minimum Requirements:

- Tourism/Language degree in any hotel management/ Language school
- Very good communication skill both in speaking and writing
- Good interpersonal skill, team spirit and organization

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
The Head of Talent and Organizational Development will drive the development of frameworks, tools and processes for talent management, succession planning, executive and leadership development, career mobility, leadership competency modeling and organizational effectiveness as well as to instill the Smart Axiata’s Vision and Corporate Values through communication and engagement among the employees so as to maintain a preferred engagement level to support the current and future business strategy and growth objectives.

    ·     Drive utilization and impact of talent identification and development processes and programs to:
             1. Identify critical top talent needs and target population(s)
             2. Facilitate movement of key talent across Smart Axiata and other operating countries
             3. Strengthen talent pipeline and feeder pools (with particular focus on critical roles and diverse talent)
             4. Build organizational capability to effectively execute strategic and operational priorities
             5. Increase readiness and success rate of individuals identified as having the potential to assume critical positions at the next more senior leadership level
    ·     Assess, enhance and manage Smart Axiata's talent review and development process to maximize success rate, ensuring inclusion and engagement of key stakeholders.
    ·     Develop and deploy Smart's Leadership Development Framework, including capability assessment, competency modeling, program identification, design, and management.
    ·     Provide consultative support to function leaders on critical and complex talent and organizational capability issues so as to build talent development capabilities and accountabilities across Smart Axiata and in support of building a learning organization.
    ·     Provide OD subject matter expertise and consultation on organizational effectiveness, organizational design, change management and teambuilding.
    ·     Prepare strategies and design toolkit to portray and uphold company’s corporate image within and outside the organisation through communication and activation.
    ·     Prepare strategies and design toolkit to roll out Smart Axiata’s Vision and Corporate Values and come up with effective communication and engagement activities to instill the Vision & Corporate Values within the organisation so as to gage employees’ satisfaction level.
    ·     Build, manage and develop a top performing T&OD team that maximizes a diverse set of skill sets, thoughts and experiences.
    ·     Collaborate with HR team to support and drive overall HR agenda and perform other tasks as required.
Job Requirement:
A. Academic Qualification:

    ·     At least Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration or related field.

B. Skills required:

    ·     Good knowledge of contemporary talent development and OD design and practices.
    ·     Good business acumen and customer focus, coupled with the self-directed ability to manage multiple projects and priorities in a practical, thoughtful and inclusive manner.
    ·     Passion and ability to affect and inspire change, to drive a culture of engagement and inclusion.
    ·     Exceptional level in instructional design and facilitation skills.
    ·     Excellent and demonstrated coaching, feedback and people development skills
    ·     Strong communication skills, interpersonal skills and team player

C. Working Experience:

    ·     Minimum 5 years of progressive experience in field of talent development, organizational development, or learning and development.
    ·     Experienced in multinational corporation environment is strongly preferred.
Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.

Job Description:
做為一個成衣跟單, 必須要有責任感並做到能夠有效率的掌握訂單, 跟進工廠進度,以確保能夠滿足客人的交期以及品質要求.

開發客戶產品以及品項, 必須掌握主副料核可進度以及跟進生產進度以及所有樣品的送核. 且必須保證全部主副料&樣品都是客人所核可的. 
要做為各部門之間溝通的橋梁, 所以的資訊公開化以及準確性從接到客人訂單到出貨這段期間.

Job Requirement:
	មានអាយុយ៉ាងតិច២០ឆ្នាំ។
	មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌យ៉ាងតិចឆ្នាំទី២ ផ្នែកសេដ្ឋកិច្ច ពាណិជ្ជសាស្រ្ត ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រមានតំលៃស្មើ។

	មានអត្តរិកស្លូតបូត ស្មោះត្រង់ ព្យាយាម និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ

មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេសរឹតតែប្រសើរ

និរន្តរនឹងផ្តល់ប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍តាមការចរចារនិងទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍បន្ថែមបន្ទាប់ពីវាយតំលៃឆ្លងផុតការសាកល្បងការងារ។
ការផ្តល់ជូនបន្ថែមវាយតំលៃតំលើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំប្រាក់បំណាច់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំនិងការធានារ៉ាប់រង ដោយស្ថាប័នជាពិសេសបេក្ខជននឹងទទួលបានការ
បណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីព ទៅថ្ងៃអនាគត និងឱកាសជាបុគ្គលិកឆ្នើមជាមួយ និរន្តរ។

បែបបទក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យ

បេក្ខជនបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបមកកាន់ស្នាក់ការ និរន្តរ ដែលមានតំរូវការបុគ្គលិកខាងលើ ដែលនៅជិត អ្នកឬស្នាក់ការកណ្តាលអាសយដ្ឋានអាគារៈ ២១-២៣-២៥ ផ្លូវ៥៩៨ សង្កាត់ភ្នំពេញថ្មី ខណ្ឌសែនសុខ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ឬតាមអ៊ីម៉ែល david.nironmfi@gmail.comឬតាមទូរស័ព្ឌ ០២៣ ៤ ៥៥០ ៥៥១ / ០៨៧ ៣៣៣ ០៣៩ រៀងរាល់ម៉ោងធ្វើការចាប់ពីថ្ងៃច័ន្ទដល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ (១២:០០ព្រឹក)។ បេក្ខជនត្រូវភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយ ៖ រូបថត ៤×៦ ចំនួន១សន្លឹក, ច្បាប់ថតចម្លងសៀវភៅគ្រួសារ, អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ និង សំបុត្រកំណើត, សញ្ញាបត្រថតចម្លងបញ្ជាក់ពីអាជ្ញាធរមានសមត្ថកិច្ច និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់ផ្សេងៗ ។

Established in 2013, CamUp Job Center has worked with the commitment of providing quality service in recruitment and human resource consultant. We are increasingly popular and become the best agency in Cambodia, which plays a vital role in job market sector in the region.

company_name: គ្រឹះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និរន្តរ ភីអិលស៊ី
Job Description:
គណនេយ្យករចំនួន ១២នាក់ សម្រាប់បម្រើការនៅ ៖ សាខាខេត្តស្វាយរៀង, អនុសាខាខេត្តមណ្ឌលគីរី, អនុសាខាស្រុក ស្រែអំបិល,អនុសាខាខេត្តស្ទឹងត្រែង, អនុសាខាស្រុកកំពង់ត្រឡាច, អនុសាខាស្រុកក្រវាញ និងអនុសាខាស្រុកកំពង់ក្តី

	ធ្វើការកត់ត្រានូវរាល់ប្រតិបត្តិការគណនេយ្យជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃទៅក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ។
	ធានាឱ្យបានថារាល់ប័ណ្ណចំណូល, ប័ណ្ណចំណាយរបស់ស្ថាប័ន និង វិក័យប័ត្រនានា ក៏ដូចជាពីខាងក្រៅត្រូវបានរៀបចំត្រឹមត្រូវ និងទាន់ ពេលវេលា។
ធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យជាប្រចាំនូវរាល់ចំណាយរបស់ស្ថាប័នដោយធ្វើការប្រៀបធៀបទៅនឹងផែនការចំណាយប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំរបស់ស្ថាប័ន។
ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវនិងទាន់ពេលវេលានូវរបាយការណ៍នានាតបទៅតាមតម្រូវការរបស់ស្នាក់ការកណ្តល ។
	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុស្ថាប័នជាប្រចាំខែត្រីមាស និងឆ្នាំ ។
	ទទួលខុសត្រូវ ការងារនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការងារគណនេយ្យ ។
Job Requirement:
	មានអាយុយ៉ាងតិច២០ឆ្នាំ។
	មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌យ៉ាងតិចឆ្នាំទី៣ ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ ឬផ្នែកដែល ពាក់ព័ន្ធ ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រមានតំលៃស្មើ។
	មានចំណេះដឹងជ្រៅជ្រះខាងផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ។
	មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកកំព្យូទ័រ Ms Word –Excel & Internet។
	មានអាកប្បកិរិយា និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ។
	អាចធ្វើការ និងស្នាក់នៅតាមបណ្តាខេត្តនានាបាន។
	ចូលចិត្តការងារជាក្រុម និងមានបំណងចង់អភិវឌ្ឍន៍ខ្លួន។
	មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេសរឹតតែប្រសើរ។
មានបទពិសោធន៍រឹតតែប្រសើរ។

និរន្តរនឹងផ្តល់ប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍តាមការចរចារនិងទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍បន្ថែមបន្ទាប់ពីវាយតំលៃឆ្លងផុតការសាកល្បងការងារ។
ការផ្តល់ជូនបន្ថែមវាយតំលៃតំលើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំប្រាក់បំណាច់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំនិងការធានារ៉ាប់រង ដោយស្ថាប័នជាពិសេសបេក្ខជននឹងទទួលបានការ
បណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីព ទៅថ្ងៃអនាគត និងឱកាសជាបុគ្គលិកឆ្នើមជាមួយ និរន្តរ។

បែបបទក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យ

បេក្ខជនបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបមកកាន់ស្នាក់ការ និរន្តរ ដែលមានតំរូវការបុគ្គលិកខាងលើ ដែលនៅជិត អ្នកឬស្នាក់ការកណ្តាលអាសយដ្ឋានអាគារៈ ២១-២៣-២៥ ផ្លូវ៥៩៨ សង្កាត់ភ្នំពេញថ្មី ខណ្ឌសែនសុខ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ឬតាមអ៊ីម៉ែល david.nironmfi@gmail.comឬតាមទូរស័ព្ឌ ០២៣ ៤ ៥៥០ ៥៥១ / ០៨៧ ៣៣៣ ០៣៩ រៀងរាល់ម៉ោងធ្វើការចាប់ពីថ្ងៃច័ន្ទដល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ (១២:០០ព្រឹក)។ បេក្ខជនត្រូវភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយ ៖ រូបថត ៤×៦ ចំនួន១សន្លឹក, ច្បាប់ថតចម្លងសៀវភៅគ្រួសារ, អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ និង សំបុត្រកំណើត, សញ្ញាបត្រថតចម្លងបញ្ជាក់ពីអាជ្ញាធរមានសមត្ថកិច្ច និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់ផ្សេងៗ ។

company_name: គ្រឹះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និរន្តរ ភីអិលស៊ី
Job Description:
មន្ត្រីឥណទានចំនួន ៦០នាក់ សម្រាប់បម្រើការនៅ ៖ ទូទាំងខេត្ត-រាជធានី ក្នុងព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា

	ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មរបស់និរន្តរ

	ចូលរួមរៀនសូត្រការធ្វើផែនការផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីការសិក្សានិងការ
គ្រប់គ្រប់តំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការនិងការពិនិត្យសាច់ប្រាក់ ។

ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការបញ្ចេញឥណទានដល់អតិថិជននិងការប្រមូលត្រលប់មកវិញបាន ១០០% ។

	វិភាគ និងថែរក្សាទីផ្សារ (ទាំងអតិថិជនចាស់ និងថ្មី)

	ធ្វើការសហការនិងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយបុគ្គលិកនិរន្តរគ្រប់លំដាប់ ថ្នាក់ អាជ្ញាធរ និងសហគមន៍នានា ។
Job Requirement:
	មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌យ៉ាងតិចចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ (ជាប់ ឬធ្លាក់បាក់ឌុប)
	អាយុយ៉ាងតិច ២០ឆ្នាំ
	មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់, ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់, សុភាពរាបសារ, មានភាពវាងវៃ, និង មានទិសដៅវែងឆ្ងាយសំរាប់អាជីព ។
	ជាមនុស្សរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់និងចូលចិត្តកិច្ចការទំនាក់ទំនង  
	មានឆន្ទះខ្ពស់ក្នុងបំរើការងារនៅតាមសហគមន៍ជនបទ
	អាចបើកបរម៉ូតូ និងមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ
	មានចំនេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស និងកុំព្យូទ័រខ្លះៗ

និរន្តរនឹងផ្តល់ប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍តាមការចរចារនិងទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍បន្ថែមបន្ទាប់ពីវាយតំលៃឆ្លងផុតការសាកល្បងការងារ។
ការផ្តល់ជូនបន្ថែមវាយតំលៃតំលើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំប្រាក់បំណាច់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំនិងការធានារ៉ាប់រង ដោយស្ថាប័នជាពិសេសបេក្ខជននឹងទទួលបានការ
បណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីព ទៅថ្ងៃអនាគត និងឱកាសជាបុគ្គលិកឆ្នើមជាមួយ និរន្តរ។

បែបបទក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យ

បេក្ខជនបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបមកកាន់ស្នាក់ការ និរន្តរ ដែលមានតំរូវការបុគ្គលិកខាងលើ ដែលនៅជិត អ្នកឬស្នាក់ការកណ្តាលអាសយដ្ឋានអាគារៈ ២១-២៣-២៥ ផ្លូវ៥៩៨ សង្កាត់ភ្នំពេញថ្មី ខណ្ឌសែនសុខ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ឬតាមអ៊ីម៉ែល david.nironmfi@gmail.comឬតាមទូរស័ព្ឌ ០២៣ ៤ ៥៥០ ៥៥១ / ០៨៧ ៣៣៣ ០៣៩ រៀងរាល់ម៉ោងធ្វើការចាប់ពីថ្ងៃច័ន្ទដល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ (១២:០០ព្រឹក)។ បេក្ខជនត្រូវភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយ ៖ រូបថត ៤×៦ ចំនួន១សន្លឹក, ច្បាប់ថតចម្លងសៀវភៅគ្រួសារ, អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ និង សំបុត្រកំណើត, សញ្ញាបត្រថតចម្លងបញ្ជាក់ពីអាជ្ញាធរមានសមត្ថកិច្ច និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់ផ្សេងៗ ។

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

job title: មន្ត្រីឥណទាន

position: មន្ត្រីឥណទាន
Job Description:
* ការរៀបចំផែនការ និង ការអភិវឌ្ឍប្រព័ន្ធការងារ
- ត្រូវរៀបចំផែនការសកម្មភាពផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន មានដូចជាការវាយតម្លៃប្រាក់កម្ចី ផែនការបញ្ចេញទុន ការវាយតម្លៃទីផ្សារ ផែនការប្រមូលប្រាក់កម្ចី និង ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
* ការរៀបចំ និង ការប្រតិបត្តិ
- ធ្វើការសិក្សាតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការដោយមានការសហការណ៍ពីប្រធានឥណទាន
- ធ្វើការសម្របសម្រួល និង ផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផលរបស់កម្មវិធីសេដ្ឋកិច្ចទៅកាន់ភូមិ និង សហគមន៍
- ធ្វើការសម្របសម្រួលតាមរយៈការប្រមូលព័ត៌មានរបស់អតិថិជនសម្រាប់
កម្មវិធីសេដ្ឋកិច្ច
- ធ្វើការសម្របសម្រួលតាមរយៈការចុះហត្ថលេខាតំណាង រវាងអតិថិជន និង កម្មវិធីសេដ្ឋកិច្ច
- ធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និង តាមដានការប្រើប្រាស់ប្រាក់កម្ចីរបស់អតិថិជន
- ធ្វើការសម្របសម្រួលកិច្ចប្រជុំប្រមូលប្រាក់កម្ចីជាមួយអតិថិជន
- ស្វែងរកអតិថិជនថ្មីៗ ថែរក្សាអតិថិជនចាស់ ធ្វើការវាយតម្លៃប្រាក់កម្ចី បញ្ចេញទុន និង ប្រមូល ប្រាក់ផ្នែក ផែនការប្រចាំខែ
- ធ្វើការតាមដានអតិថិជនដែលបង់ប្រាក់យឺតយ៉ាវ និង ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
- ធ្វើការរៀបចំវិក័យប័ត្របញ្ចេញទុន ប្រាក់សន្សំ ដកប្រាក់ ប្រមូលប្រាក់
- ធ្វើការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតក្រោមការណែនាំរបស់ប្រធាន
* ការត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដាន និង ការរាយការណ៍
- ធានាថាដំណើរការប្រាក់កម្ចីប្រព្រឹត្តទៅដោយរលូន
- មន្រ្តីឥណទានត្រូវធ្វើការរាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និង ប្រចាំខែអំពីស្ថានភាពឥណទាន ក្នុងតំបន់ របស់ខ្លួន គ្រប់គ្រងទៅកាន់ប្រធានឥណទាន
* ការកសាងសមត្ថភាព
- ត្រូវចូលរួមកិច្ចប្រជុំរបស់កម្មវិធីសេដ្ឋកិច្ច សមាគមឥណទានសហគ្រិនគ្រួសារ និង សកម្មភាពអភិវឌ្ឍន៍បុគ្គលិក
- រក្សានូវអត្តចរិត និង អាកប្បកិរិយាល្អ ដែលជាគម្រូរសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកដ៏៏ទៃៗទៀត
- បុគ្គលិកត្រូវធានាថាមានការយល់ដឹងអំពីតួនាទីការងារផ្ទាល់ខ្លួនច្បាស់លាស់
- ត្រូវធានាថា បានបំពេញទាន់ពេលវលានូវតារាងវាយតម្លៃផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន
សម្រាប់ប្រចាំឆមាស និង ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
* ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអ្នកពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- វើការកសាង និង រក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងរវាងបុគ្គលិក និង បុគ្គលិក
- ធ្វើការសម្របសម្រួលជាមួយបុគ្គលិកដៃគូ ដើម្បីកំណត់ភូមិ និង តំបន់សក្តានុពលសម្រាប់ ពង្រីក
- ធ្វើការសម្របសម្រួលជាមួយបុគ្គលិកសមាគមប្រតិបត្តិករឥណទាន និង អាជ្ញាធរ ដែលស្ថិតនៅក្នុងតំបន់ ប្រតិបត្តិការ
Job Requirement:
- ភេទ ប្រុស
- ជានិស្សិតបញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា មានភាពប៉ិនប្រសប់ ហើយមានសមត្ថភាពធ្វើការក្នុងបរិយាកាសការងារមានសម្ពាធ
- មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និង ជំនាញក្នុងការលើកទឹកចិត្ត
- 	បេក្ខជនរស់នៅតំបន់គោលដៅត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្ត
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និង ប្រឹងប្រែងក្នុងការងារ
- មានសមត្ថភាពធ្វើដំណើរដោយម៉ូតូបានយូរ
- មានសមត្ថភាពធ្វើការក្រោមការណែនាំរបស់ប្រធាន

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ
- ប្រាក់បៀវត្សអាស្រ័យលើសមត្ថភាពការងារ និង បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភសុខភាពប្រចាំខែ

_ Prepare evaluation tools and arrange the schedule and conduct the interview

_ Conduct reference and background checks for potential candidates

_ Confirm job offer to the selected candidates and notify the unsuccessfully candidate

_ Notify the selected candidates to hiring managers

_ Issue employment contract for selected candidates

_ Ensure all vacancies are filled with the suitable candidates within the targeted time

_ Conducts new employee orientation and coordinates the entire induction process

_ Responsible for designing induction process for new hires

_ Generate HR Operations related report

_ Conduct exit interview and proceed the exit check list

_ Ensure all recruitment policies, and procedures are adhered to and recommend for improvements

_ Assist in policy and procedure development

_ Establish  and maintain recruitment files and records on an on-going basis

_ Run shop steward election and process the official letter to Ministry of Labor

Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.

Job Description:
•	Conduct in-depth legal and policy research in one or more fields related to the legislative agenda and issues of importance to the nation. Research is based primarily on legal and subject matter resources, Cambodian laws and regulations and laws and regulations of other jurisdictions, legal treatises, professional and scientific journals and reports; some field research may be required.
•	Prepare research reports, policy briefs and training and workshop materials. Present research in the form of unbiased expert opinions, policy briefs, case studies, manuals and professional publications.
•	Manage, train, mentor and supervise researchers to conduct legal and policy research
•	Ensure that research material produced in both English and Khmer meets the highest international level research standards. Ensure quality control of Khmer research material.
•	Provides leadership to research staff who assist in the production of all research material, train staff in the proper use of legal and technical terminology. 
•	Draft the annual research and training activity plan in the area in which the Senior Researcher is assigned to work, and participate in the evaluation of program activities. 
•	Draft contribution to the annual report on research, support and training activities. 
•	Contribute to the ongoing institutional development.
Job Requirement:
•	Master’s degree (or higher) from an overseas university in law, economics, public finance, political science or related fields.
•	Strong background in legal research and legislative analysis and/or public policy research and development. Previous experience working with a legislative body is an advantage.
•	A proven track record of producing/writing high quality research papers and managing the production of research projects. 
•	Strong management and communication skills, including budgeting
•	Ability to plan effectively, set goals and meet deadlines.
•	Computer skills sufficient to produce work products in MS Word (English and Khmer)
•	Excellent oral and written skills in Khmer, good English 
•	Willingness to travel to the provinces

Reporting
•	To the Research Director

Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.
Contact Info: Contact Information Kanhaly  010202136 No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh   010202136

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

job title: Up to $1000 Salary, [Sales Manager] with JAPANESE Language
position: Up to $1000 Salary, [Sales Manager] with JAPANESE Language
Job Description:
"DESCRIPTION"
SALES MANAGER or TEAM LEADER (UP TO YOUR SKILL & EXPERIENCE)

"JOB PURPOSE" 
Serves Landlords by finding tenants or buyers; Meeting the landlords needs
Serves Clients by finding properties; Meeting the clients’ needs

"JOB DUTIES"
1. Visit Properties and Landlords and Get Property Details over prime area of Phnom Penh on Paper Sheet; 3 properties' information per day shall be the quota

2. Manage a Team and Work with Two Other Team Members to Achieve Your Target

3. Put Posts & Update Our Websites in Japanese

4. Make a Property Description Sheet in Japanese And Offer to Clients

5. Recruit Your Team Members

6. Submit Weekly Report & Monthly Report to General Manager

7. Perform as an assistant for General Manager

"SALARY" (1)Base Pay + (2)Performance-based Pay

(1) Base Pay: 
USD450 to USD1,000 per month including salary tax (UP TO YOUR LANGUAGE LEVEL & WORK EXPERIENCE)

For example, if you have taken master degree in Japan and speak and write fluent Japanese in addition to MUST skill and experience below, USD1,000 will be paid.

(2) Performance-based Pay:
Additional payment shall be paid to your team if your team reaches to the target of the year. It is up to you whether you take all or share this with your members. 

"WORKING HOURS"
From 8:00 To 17:00 (1 Hour Lunch Break)
From Mon to Fri plus Saturday morning
Holiday: Sunday and Public Holidays
Job Requirement:
"MUST"
- Work Experience: 3 Years Work Experience in one Company
- Japanese Language: N2 or More (JLPT: Japanese Language Proficiency Test)
- Microsoft Office Skill: Word, Excel, Power Point etc..)
- Attitude: Pleasant & Positive as Well as Punctual with Work and Time Demands

"PREFERABLE"
- English: Business Level
- Work Experience: Work Experience in Real Estate Field
- Overseas Experience: Studied In Japan or Advanced Country

If you are well qualified and interested in this recruitment, please send a cover letter and current CV immediately to: hasegawa@espa-asia.com
Company Profile:
"ABOUT ESPACIO FROM JAPAN"
Espacio group has 20 years history as the BEST environmental consultancy company to major commercial complexes as well as real estate agency in Japan. We have been related to more than 2000 major projects through the history since establishment and have built a web of trust in Japan.

Espacio (Cambodia) is established in April 2012 in Phnom Penh as the Espacio Group’s second south east asia base. 

The group is in the midst of accelerating overseas operations. The first expansion to south east asia was to HCMC, Vietnam as a cafe restaurant in Sep,2011 then the real estate agency company was established continuously. 

"MISSION"
We will realize the fairness and transparence of real estate industry in Cambodia through the daily duties as a representative player from Japan and the activities as an executive member of CVEA association.

"VISION"
To be a Chroy Changvar Bridge between Japanese investors and Cambodian landlords.

"CORE VALUES"
1. Honesty 
2. Commitment
3. Inquisition

"ACTIVITIES"

Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.
Contact Info: Contact Information Kanhaly  010202136 No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh   010202136

The eLearning developer will be responsible for creating and maintaining eLearning content for Khalibre End User training courses. The ideal candidate will be able to effortlessly join an existing team in a high performance culture and develop strong working relationships with the Chief Learning Officer, and with Subject Matter Experts (SMEs). 

- Design and develop interactive Learning courses
- Work with members of the Content Development team to develop Learning  using industry leading authoring tools and development techniques to program interactivity into Learning courses
- Team player who is strategic, persuasive, flexible, adaptable, and collaborative in a goal-oriented organization, rapidly shifting priorities, and multiple stakeholders
- Develop/Analyze storyboards and other documentation and make recommendations for proper interactive and development strategies
- Edit and modify video and audio files for courses using software applications
- Produce custom interactive elements
- Working with and create custom graphics in tools such as Photoshop, Illustrator, etc.
- Manage multiple projects, meet deadlines, and use prioritization skills 
- Offer innovative, creative solutions for organizational problems
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree with minimum of 1-2 year experience in desktop publishing, graphic design, or marketing communication
- High proficiency in computer software applications;  especially MS PowerPoint
- Strong oral and written English communications skills is a must
- Thrive in a fast-paced, project-driven organization
- Results oriented
- Demonstrate accuracy and attention-to-detail
- Adapt quickly and easily to changing requirements and needs from clients
- Manage multiple priorities and project deadlines
- Comfortable in a client centric collaborative environment 
- Ensure quality control throughout the project lifecycle 
- Commitment to service and quality 
- Working knowledge of instructional design, adult learning methodology and development  of Web- based training is a plus
- Any video or multimedia experience a plus

Application Information
This is a very good opportunity for the right candidate. Khalibre will offer a good salary and long term secure future with prospects for continuous skills improvement and good experience.

To apply for this position please send an email to opportunities@khalibre.com with CV and cover letter. Women are strongly encouraged to apply.

Job Description:
Karavansara Retreat & Residences (Hotel & Serviced Apartments) is seeking a Hotel Manager:

The hotel manager will be responsible for the day-to-day management of the Karavansara Retreat and Residences Siem Reap and its staff. They will have commercial accountability for budgeting and financial management, planning, organizing and directing all hotel operations, including front-of-house (reception,
concierge, reservations), food and beverage operations, and housekeeping.

While working with the owners to make a strategic planning to maximize profits, the manager must also pay attention to the details, setting the example for staff to deliver a standard of service and presentation that meets guests' needs and expectations. Business and people management are equally important elements.

In a smaller establishment, the manager is much more hands-on and involved in the day-to-day running of the hotel, which may include carrying out reception duties or serving meals if the need arises. The position of Hotel Manager requires persons who are highly responsible, effective, confident and capable.
• Be resourceful, inventive and self-confident

These individuals must ensure that company goals are met in a timely fashion by efficiently and effectively managing personnel and resources. The post requires its incumbent to have excellent multi-tasking, organizational, interpersonal and leadership skills, as well as a thorough knowledge of the industry and related finances.
Company Profile: Karavansara Retreat & Residences offers luxury serviced apartments, boutique hotel, and a Khmer fusion restaurant. Located only 150 meters from town, Karavansara boasts award-winning architectural design, exceptional service and a small number of rooms set in a lush tropical garden to ensure exclusivity and privacy.

Company Profile:
COGETEL Ltd. (ONLINE) is the leading ISP and broadband provider in the country; established in July 1997 by Telstra
Cambodia as Bigpond Cambodia – the first commercial Internet Service Provider in the country. In 2002, Cogetel Limited acquired the business from Telstra marking the beginning of its ADSL service and its new brand name – ONLINE.

ONLINE subsequently brought in WiMAX, Long-range WiFi, and Fiber Optic to increase its range of last miles technology to meet any need of its customers.

ONLINE strives to deliver products and services that are tailored to its customers’ Internet technology needs, easily understood and used, delivered with warmth, knowledge and experience throughout the years. Supported by its core drive of keeping people in touch with their world; ONLINE always brings innovative products and services to Cambodia, thus keeping Cambodia abreast with latest technologies worldwide.

Our uniquely tailored services continue to meet the needs of diverse customers – whether for domestic, corporate, single or multiple users, academic or leisure purposes. Online improves communications with the rest of the world through ideal, reliable and secure connection coupled with excellent support services. ONLINE is connected to the world directly through mainland China, Hong Kong, Thailand, European countries, through redundant fiber optic cable making us the most vigorous ISP in Cambodia with abundant and diverse routes around the world.

Our Mission
To deliver technology solutions to achieve superior operational performance that enables us to provide our customers with exceptional service.

Our Vision
To be the primary internet service provider of choice and ideal company that provides fostering work environment.

Our uniquely tailored services continue to meet the needs of diverse customers – whether for domestic, corporate, single or multiple users, academic or leisure purposes. Online improves communications with the rest of the world through ideal, reliable and secure connection coupled with excellent support services. ONLINE is connected to the world directly through mainland China, Hong Kong, Thailand, European countries, through redundant fiber optic cable making us the most vigorous ISP in Cambodia with abundant and diverse routes around the world.

Our Mission
To deliver technology solutions to achieve superior operational performance that enables us to provide our customers with exceptional service.

Our Vision
To be the primary internet service provider of choice and ideal company that provides fostering work environment.

មុខតំណែងៈ 	មន្ត្រីឥណទាន ចំនួន ០2 រូប សំរាប់ ស្នាក់ការតាខ្មៅ

-យ៉ាងហោចមានសញ្ញាប័ត្របញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់ មធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ

Job Description:
1.Join with team for Maintenance workshop, equipment and tools in order to prepare ready for operation in workshop.
2.Test drive vehicles, and test components and systems, using equipment such as infrared engine analyzers, compression gauges, and computerized diagnostic devices.
3. Repair, reline, replace, and adjust brakes.
4. Review work orders and discuss work with supervisors.
5. Follow checklists to ensure all important parts are examined, including belts, hoses, steering systems, spark plugs, brake and fuel systems, wheel bearings, and other potentially troublesome areas.
6. Plan work procedures, using charts, technical manuals, and experience.
7. Test and adjust repaired systems to meet manufacturers' performance specifications
8. Confer with Service Advisor to obtain descriptions of vehicle problems, and to discuss work to be performed and future repair requirements.
9. Perform routine and scheduled maintenance services such as oil changes, lubrications, and tune-ups.
10. Disassemble units and inspect parts for wear, using micrometers, calipers, and gauges.
11. Overhaul or replace carburetors, blowers, generators, distributors, starters, and pumps.
12. Repair and service air conditioning, heating, engine-cooling, and electrical systems.
13. Repair or replace parts such as pistons, rods, gears, valves, and bearings, radiator leaks, damaged automobile bodies, manual and automatic transmissions
14. Tear down, repair, and rebuild faulty assemblies such as power systems, steering systems, and linkages.
15. Rewire ignition systems, lights, and instrument panels.
16. Install and repair accessories such as radios, heaters, mirrors, and windshield wipers.
17. Repair or replace shock absorbers.
18. Align vehicles' front ends.
19. Rebuild parts such as crankshafts and cylinder blocks.
20. Replace and adjust headlights. 
21. Do other tasks as assigned by the supervisor
Job Requirement:
- Graduated from technical school related to automotive mechanic.
- Can speak and write in English Language.
- Willing to learn in English language for technical knowledge gain from website
- At least 2 years experiences with automobiles repair or maintenances 
- Good basic understanding and working knowledge of the following systems, engine, suspensions, gearboxes, air-conditioning, electrics, and electronics.,Vehicle diagnostic system also
- Loyalty, honesty, persistence, and a positive attitude
- Ability to learn new things very quickly
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

job title: 人力资源部经理 (Human Resource Director)
position: 人力资源部经理 (Human Resource Director)

Job Description:
• skill full to recruitment of new staff and internal mobility according to company requirements
• Monitor employees’ integration and training according to company standards
• good compliance with local labor law and health & safety regulations
• Supervise payroll processing, and administration of employees records
• Implements guidelines, policies, and procedures in compliance with corporate standards
• Manage performance appraisal review system according to company standards
• Controls and monitors staff commitments and Annual goals & objectives.
• Performs the program of additional work activities.
• Measure employee satisfaction through appropriate tools

inquiries and promote team member satisfaction

• Excellent organizational skills, attention to details
• Good presentation, good and positive attitude

Interested candidate is required to send the Cv with recent photo and send via : thavrath@aplusgroup.biz

1.Kramourn Sar
2.Chaom Chao (near chaom Chao circle)
3.Chbar Ampov (near phsar Chbar Ampov)

Salry : 150$/ month
Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

            +++++++++++++++++++++

1- គ្រប់គ្រងការងារផ្ទះ/Home careមានអាហារស្នាក់ 200$-300$
2- សេវាកម្មហាង ភោជនីយដ្ឋានមានអាហារស្នាក់ 150$-200$
3- ទីផ្សារ/លក់ 300$- 1000$

5- ជាងជំនាញ(ដែក អ៊ីណុក កញ្ចក់ ឈើ ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ សំណង់ ភ្លើង
 ដេរសំលៀកបំពាក់...300$- 800$ 
6-អ្នកជំនាញមាន ចុងភៅ ពេទ្យ វិស្វករ ស្ថាបត្យករ.. 300$-800$
7- កម្មករទូទៅ $170- $230
8- គ្រូបង្រៀន/អ្នកបកប្រែ ៖ ភាសាខ្មែរ អង់គ្លេស ចិន ជប៉ុន....200$-700$
9- អ្នកបើកបរ(ក្បាល2, 3 ,4 ,5,) $200- $300
10- អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង (supervisor​​ to manager ) $350- $2000

job title: Senior Credit Assessment Officer or Supervisor
position: Senior Credit Assessment Officer or Supervisor
Job Description:
Company Profile: Our client who is formerly known as Automotive vehicle company which has head office at Japan is looking for passionate individuals with leadership potential and who are driven towards performance excellence for the position: Senior Credit Assessment Officer.

Responsibilities:
- Conduct Application and Documents Verification
- Input Application Information into System Promptly and Accurately.
- Conduct the Application Examination.
- Perform Credit Assessment
- Summarize and Recommend for Credit Decision.
-Prepare Daily, Weekly and Monthly Credit Assessment Report.
- Perform other duties as assigned
- Other jobs and duties.

Requirements:
- Bachelor degree in Finance and Banking or Economics or Accounting
- Minimum two (2) years working experience in credit assessment.
- Analytic skill
- Survey skill
- Negotiation skill
- Good interpersonal and communication
- Self-motivated, flexible, proactive and team work spirit
- Able to speak and communicate in English.
- Computer literacy
- Strong commitment to work under pressure and be willing to travel to provinces
Job Requirement:

Established in 2013, CamUp Job Center has worked with the commitment of providing quality service in recruitment and human resource consultant. We are increasingly popular and become the best agency in Cambodia, which plays a vital role in job market sector in the region.

CamUp Job Center is specialized in accounting, finance, real estate, engineering, IT, industry, construction, and other job sectors. We tend to passionately perform our jobs with high efficiency and dedication. Our 6 unique points:

• We can help you to effectively save time with all responsibilities within the recruitment process, especially dealing with the large pool of applications

job title: Admin Staff in charge of Marketing Team
position: Admin Staff in charge of Marketing Team
Job Description:
- Supporting Manager/GM for planning 
- Market date input in the system 
- Arranging schedule and data input (Test Drive)
- Supporting for Toyota Event like Toyota Classic and Toyota Mekong Cup
- Clearing Marketing Department invoice end of the month 
- Answering customers’ call to inquire about Toyota promotion 
- Conducting Sale Satisfaction Index with customer with face to face interview or by phone call 
- Collecting competitor’s information (sale and promotion) 
- Calling customers to collect market data 
- Other jobs assigned by Asst Marketing Manager/Manager/GM

- Fresh graduate is encouraged to apply

- Able to work with less supervision
- Good Interpersonal skill
- Good English communication
- Honest and hard working
- Strong computer skills and knowledge
Company Profile: Toyota (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. is a sole exclusive distributor for all TOYOTA vehicles, Genuine Parts and Quality Service in the Kingdom of Cambodia. With the endless and massive support from our manufacturer, we have always taken into consideration regarding the right selection of suitable products into Cambodian market. To make the best choice, the critical survey on market condition such as road condition, fuel quality, driving behavior, weather and so forth is thoroughly conducted and analyzed for the aim of ensuring the conformity of our products. As a result, many different varieties of TOYOTA models have been introduced to satisfy our customer's needs and wants.

job title: Relationship Manager (Thai Biz) and Relationship Manager (Vietnamese Biz)
position: Relationship Manager (Thai Biz) and Relationship Manager (Vietnamese Biz)
Job Description:
1. Relationship Manager - Thai Business

Responsibilities:
•	Set up sound marketing strategy to attract more customers; especially, Thai customers
•	Finds new Thai Business relationships and leads into new clients
•	Pro-active promotes the products and services of the bank to both the existing and potential customers
•	Manage Thai Business relationships
•	Gathers market and customer information to analyze and report the success/effectiveness of targeted advertising campaigns, special events/promotions
•	Advises on forthcoming product developments and discussing special promotions
•	Preparing and supervising the production of publicity brochures, handouts, direct mail leaflets, promotional videos, photographs, films and multimedia programs
•	Recommend more bank products and provide business advice that will benefit Thai business client
•	Consult with clients in order to help the clients resolve issues and concerns that they have regarding their credit, according to Canadia Bank
•	Deepen and secure existing and new Thai business relationships through the analysis of needs and provision of products and services
•	Relationship Manager is responsible for developing and maintaining a portfolio in an assigned market
•	Relationship Manager is responsible for establishing relationships with Thai customers that the bank needs ongoing relationships with
•	Carry out other tasks which are beneficial to the Bank and perform other duties as assigned by Top Managements

2. Relationship Manager - Vietnamese Business

Responsibilities:
•	Set up sound marketing strategy to attract more customers; especially, Vietnamese customers
•	Finds new V.N Business relationships and leads into new clients
•	Pro-active promotes the products and services of the bank to both the existing and potential customers
•	Manage Vietnamese Business relationships
•	Gathers market and customer information to analyze and report the success/effectiveness of targeted advertising campaigns, special events/promotions
•	Advises on forthcoming product developments and discussing special promotions
•	Preparing and supervising the production of publicity brochures, handouts, direct mail leaflets, promotional videos, photographs, films and multimedia programs
•	Recommend more bank products and provide business advice that will benefit Vietnamese business client
•	Consult with clients in order to help the clients resolve issues and concerns that they have regarding their credit, according to Canadia Bank
•	Deepen and secure existing and new V.N business relationships through the analysis of needs and provision of products and services
•	Relationship Manager is responsible for developing and maintaining a portfolio in an assigned market
•	Relationship Manager is responsible for establishing relationships with V.N customers that the bank needs ongoing relationships with
•	Carry out other tasks which are beneficial to the Bank and perform other duties as assigned by Top Managements
Job Requirement:
1. Relationship Manager - Thai Business

Requirements:
•	Minimum Bachelor’s degree in business or any relevant field
•	Strong knowledge of banking products

Company Profile:
Canadia Bank Plc. was established on 11th November 1991 as “Canadia Gold & Trust Corporation Ltd.”, joint-venture between Cambodian - Canadians and the National Bank of Cambodia (Central Bank of Cambodia). The bank’s management consisted of former staff of the National Bank of Cambodia and its Cambodian – Canadian shareholders.

The main activities were based on gold transactions, gold plaque manufacturing and lending to local merchants. On 19th April 1993 the name was changed into CANADIA BANK LTD., licensed as a Commercial Bank with the National Bank of Cambodia and registered with the Ministry of Commerce. On 16th December 2003 the name of the bank changed into CANADIA BANK PLC. (Public Limited Company).

Since privatization in 1998 the Bank has become the largest local bank in Cambodia. With a worldwide network of correspondent banking relationships and a solid base of local and international customers CANADIA BANK PLC holds commanding market shares in loans as well as deposits. The bank offers a wide range of financial services through its Head Office and its more than 50 branches in Phnom Penh and major cities throughout the country.

Company Profile:
Canadia Bank Plc. was established on 11th November 1991 as “Canadia Gold & Trust Corporation Ltd.”, joint-venture between Cambodian - Canadians and the National Bank of Cambodia (Central Bank of Cambodia). The bank’s management consisted of former staff of the National Bank of Cambodia and its Cambodian – Canadian shareholders.

The main activities were based on gold transactions, gold plaque manufacturing and lending to local merchants. On 19th April 1993 the name was changed into CANADIA BANK LTD., licensed as a Commercial Bank with the National Bank of Cambodia and registered with the Ministry of Commerce. On 16th December 2003 the name of the bank changed into CANADIA BANK PLC. (Public Limited Company).

Since privatization in 1998 the Bank has become the largest local bank in Cambodia. With a worldwide network of correspondent banking relationships and a solid base of local and international customers CANADIA BANK PLC holds commanding market shares in loans as well as deposits. The bank offers a wide range of financial services through its Head Office and its more than 50 branches in Phnom Penh and major cities throughout the country.

As Web / Wordpress developer you will be responsible for creating and maintaining many attractive and engaging web presence for our projects and customers. Company Profile:
Better Factories Cambodia is an innovative partnership program between the International Labour Organization (ILO) and the International Finance Corporation (IFC). It aims to improve labour standards and competitiveness in global supply chains. Better Work involves the development of both global tools and country level programs. The focus is on scalable and sustainable solutions which build cooperation between government, employers’ and workers’ organizations, and international buyers.

The program has three components:
1. Enterprise assessments on the compliance of the Cambodian labour law and core international labour
standards;
2. Enterprise advisory and training services designed to support practical improvements; and
3. Stakeholder engagement and sustainability.

For more information about the project see www.betterfactories.org
Better Factories Cambodia is part of the Better Work family which comprises similar programme in Vietnam, Indonesia, Jordan, Haiti, Nicaragua, Bangladesh, Ethiopia and Egypt (pilot).

For more information about Better Work, see: www.betterwork.org

Company Profile:
Cambodia Post Bank Plc. (CP Bank) is a full licensing commercial bank, offering financial solutions to aspiring individuals and enterprises in Cambodia. CP Bank is a strategic partnership between Canadia Investment Holding Plc., Cambodia’s Ministry of Post and Telecommunications and Fullerton Financial Holdings Pte. Ltd. Cambodia Post Bank Plc. (CP Bank) is a full licensing commercial bank, offering financial solutions to aspiring individuals and enterprises in Cambodia. CP Bank is a strategic partnership between Canadia Investment Holding Plc., Cambodia’s Ministry of Post and Telecommunications and Fullerton Financial Holdings Pte. Ltd. Opened in September 2013, CP Bank offers its customers a suite of loan and deposit products, as well as remittance and FX services, for their personal and business needs. With a clear strategic direction and long term commitment, in a few years ahead, CP Bank will expand the branch network to more than 100 branch offices across Cambodia.

We recognize our greatest asset is our people. That is why we are creating a unique climate of inspiration, leadership and great opportunities that will enable the best in market to thrive a part of our diverse team. 

To support our growth for 2015 with the expansion of more than 40 branches network and more than 1300 employees, we are now looking for recruiting customer-oriented and motivated individuals for the following positions to join us in our journey to grow our business and people.

Job Description:
To be responsible for overall Prepaid products and services plan from the product design, development, pricing, testing, and roll out, in conjunction with company objective and strategy.
        To manage, coordinate and foster working relationship within internal organization and third parties related to Prepaid products to ensure smooth & profitable results.
        Study, analyze, and understand on telecom products in order to offer the right products to different kinds of subscribers.
        Prepaid product road map, forecasting, and development.
        Preparing Business Case, Product Go to Market to be going live & other proposals.
        Providing business case study for each initiated products such as competitors' products, comparisons both in local telecom and oversea telecom.
        Contributing ideas for the creation of new product features, packaging and enhancements based on feedback from market and industry trends.
        Develop products 360 and strategy including planning and executing.
        Ensure new product has been developed and tested properly before going live.
        Coordinate with inter related section to get all information/requirement in order to deliver the good product for the right market.
        Coordinating with cross-functional teams on new products training and after sale service.
        Accountable for Prepaid business: subscriber base, revenue, ARPU, and other key performance indicators for respective product category.
        Performing other tasks as required by superior.
Job Requirement:
Bachelor degree in reputable universities (preferable with Bachelor in Marketing)
        Good command of English, spoken & written.
        Good communications & interpersonal skills.
        Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, with attention to details, timelines, and strong commitment to diversity.
        Good knowledge of business case development.
        knowledge in Mobile Telecommunication is an advantage.
        Good report writing skills.
        2 years of experiences in a management/supervisory position.
        1 year working experiences of technical related (Billing or Core Network) is a benefit.
Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.

Job Description:
·         Work to help prevent harm to staff, property, the environment and the general public.

·         Formulate and develop Safety Manual for the company and implement safety program or prevent or correct unsafe environment working conditions, utilizing knowledge of industrial processes, mechanics, chemistry, psychology and industrial health and safety laws.

·         Determine requirements for safety clothing and devices, designs, build, and install or, direct installation of safety devices or machinery.

·         Examine plans and specifications and designs for new machinery or equipment, equipment rooms, telecom BTS sites, shops, office spaces to ensure all safety precautions to have been included.

·         Tour equipment rooms and other facilities to inspect fire and safety equipment, machinery and facilities to identify and correct potential hazards and ensure compliance with safety regulations.

·         Review and inspect on-site safety conditions and investigating industrial accidents to minimize recurrence and prepare accidents reports.

·         Monitor and report accidents/incidents happened to staff and the company for further measure/actions/lessons.

·         Lead investigation of all serious incidents and assist in carrying out root cause analysis and learned from experience reviews to produce recommendations on control measure to prevent reoccurrence.

·         Conduct “OHS” or “EHS” Trainings to educate employees on work safety principles, measures and policies and refresh the course on a regular basis.

·         Enforce the compliance of employees to work on safety principles and policies.

·         Provide fire safety advice contributing to the care and well being of employees.

·         Ensure night staff receiving regular training and those can respond appropriately in the event of fire.

·         Ensure that work is delivered consistently with company’s technical safety discipline procedures and guidance.

·         May conduct air quality tests for presence of harmful gases and vapors.
Job Requirement:
·         University degree in Science or Engineering, Master Degree is a plus.

·         2-3 years of relevant experience in EHS or OHS.

·         Good English and Khmer language both spoken and written.

·         Good presentation and training skills

·         Good problem solving skills.

·         Good interpersonal skills and proven ability to work well in a team environment.

·         Willingness to work under pressure.

·         Proficiency in computer skills, MS-Office, Email, etc.

·         Car driving license.

Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

Job Description:
Working on a 24 hour rotating shift (of about 8.00 hours each), to record and facilitate the implementation, coordination and forward planning of movements of trains, light locomotives, track inspection and maintenance vehicles across the Cambodian railway network. The Train Controller position is responsible for creating a safe working environment where risks are identified, understood and managed and a safe environment for customers and visitors is maintained and reported to the Train Transit Manager in order to meet TRR’s business requirements. The safe and efficient scheduling of trains in an accident free environment is mandatory.
•Implement the daily train plan while responding to changing operational requirements
•Document and record time accurate information on traffic performance utilizing Train Control Graphs, Train Orders Track Authority Orders and by monitoring the GPS tracking system
•Implement alternate plans where disruptions occur to the daily train plan and advise appropriate staff of alterations to service
•Ensure train departures and arrivals meets both customer expectations and Quality Assurance procedures
•Provide assistance and relief to train crew and operations staff when accidents, incidents or later running of trains occur

Business Management
•Implementation strategies to ensure delivery and compliance with the Corporate Business Plan 
•Participate in planning and developing strategies for Business Improvement Programs 

Safety 
•Maintain a safe working environment that provides for the safety and well being of staff, the community, customers, rolling stock, infrastructure and the environment 
•Ensure that train working, track working and train operations are in accordance with Safety Management System requirements

Security
•Ensure the Train Control room is secure and no unauthorised access is allowed
•When instructed take steps to implement TRR’s Security Management plan in accordance with the Security Management Manual

Compliance
•Comply with TRR’s Safety Management System
•Ensure compliance with the TRR’s policies and procedures in relation to the operation of the railway and SHREQ
•Implement accident, incident and emergency evacuation and site working plans

Risk
•Identify relevant business risks and work with the Train Transit Manager on mitigation strategies in area of responsibility.

Customer and Community
•Build co-operative networks with internal and external customers
•Manage customer expectations
Document and record customer feedback
Job Requirement:
TRR aims to conduct its business in a safe working environment and to meet corporate objectives and customer expectations. The quality of service delivery provided to customers is measured and managed in a culture of performance management and safety, health, risk, environment and quality controls. The quality must be managed through reference to standards, documented procedures and KPI’s, while ensuring that safety is maintained by following risk management, incident reporting, and investigation procedures.  
•Diligence, honesty and safety awareness
•Cambodian and English language
•Degree in Transport and Logistics or similar
•Experience in managing transport or logistics distribution
•Experience in managing freight terminals or in a train operating environment
•As per the Toll Royal Railway Delegations of Authority Manual
Be able to make decision and work under pressure
Comply with TRR’s Safety Management System as it relates to train operations
Be a good and clear communication with all level within the organization
Be able to perform a various complex and challenging tasks
•Required to work extended hours and weekends as required

Job Description:
- Institute linkages with government officials and agencies whose policies and decisions directly affect the company

- Serve as a liaison between the company and media owners and work closely with agencies to monitor and execute PR plans

- Develop and maintain the company’s corporate image and identity

- Organize and coordinate CSR programs and activities

- Steer and control company’s press releases and its utilization by media and press

- Write up speeches, press releases, company newsletter article and translate from English into Khmer and vice versa

- On-spot interpreting company’s top executives’ speeches and interviews

- Organize and coordinate press conferences, interviews and press tours

- Represent the company in public events from time to time

- Work closely with the Marketing Manager to forecast and closely monitor the PR budget and to follow the PR calendar

- Update and maintain a library of competitors’ PR activities and conduct competitive benchmarking and analysis

- Communication: In coordination with the concerned Business Unit/s, prepare the company’s positioning statement & assist in preparing press releases, or any other form of PR, on issues affecting the company

- Archive all PR files, press releases, speeches and documents
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Journalism or Communication & Public Relations

- Minimum 2 years experience in similar role

- Excellent Khmer and English, both oral and written

- Experience in PR is a plus

- Be able to prioritize tasks work under pressure

- Possess project management skills

- Creative, active, good communication and interpersonal skills
Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.
Contact Info: Contact Information Kanhaly  010202136 No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh   010202136

 ដេរសំលៀកបំពាក់...300$- 800$

Job Description:
- Design Interior & Exterior drawing in office and sometime go to check site 
- Develop of Interior Design concept and detail of production drawing 
- High level of landlord/client interaction to determine the required interior & architecture design specifics
- Work with project team (s) on conceptual designs, presentations, design development, and production
- Coordinate with consultants, contractors, fabricators, and regulatory agencies to meet overall project objective
-Resolve complex design issues with innovative and practical solutions
- Produce graphic presentations, 3D renderings, and construction drawings
Job Requirement:
-Graduated with an experience on interior design/architecture projects
- Must be a motivated self-starter with the ability to problem solve both individually and as a part of a project teams
- Proficiency in the use of 2D/3D software, including 3D Studio MAX, Sketch up, Photo Shop, In Design and Illustrator. PDF (Acrobat Professional is highly desired)
- Knowledge of materials, construction techniques, and building codes
- Strong organizations skills and the ability to work on multiple projects at the same time.
- Strong graphic and visualization skills to communicate design ideas
- Bachelors’ Degree in Architecture or other qualify degree
