Job Description:
1.	Works closely and effectively with the President by keeping him well informed of upcoming commitments, responsibilities and deadlines, following up appropriately 
2.	Responsible for setting up of financial controls and other internal controls to ensure effective risk management practices
3.	Streamline, improve and automate processes and systems
4.	Supervise and co-ordinate management the monthly and year-end closing activities including tax returns in a tax-efficient way as per the corporate and statutory reporting timelines
5.	Provide leadership and coordination in the administration, business and management accounting and financial management of the group companies.
6.	Pro-actively driven in coordinating and analyzing monthly reporting, cash flow forecasts, budgets, financial information and related tax computation of various countries and multiple entities
7.	Taking on some of the manager's responsibilities and working more closely with management; 
8.	To assist the management with the daily operation of the President's business, including but not limited to, documents translation and preparation, as well as necessary administration works.
9.	To assist the management to communicate with Customers and Business Associates, as well as the Public, including but not limited to, Translations, Conversations, Interviews, and Presentations.
10.	To assist the management to Recruit, Train, Supervise, and Coach Independent Franchisee, including but not limited to, Appointments, Interviews, Presentations, Training, and Seminars.
11.	Analyze and monitor internal processes
12.	Implement procedural and policy changes to improve operational efficiency 
13.	Record the minutes meeting
14.	Perform other duties as may be assigned by management from time to time
Job Requirement:
1.	Professional Degree in Accounting / Finance / Business Management / Business of Law  or relevant skills
2.	Female Khmer Nationality 
3.	At least 3 years experiences in a fast-paced management environment.
4.	Good knowledge in accounting/finance is advantage
5.	Strong co-ordination and team management skills
6.	Fluent in Khmer and English both writing and speaking. Chinese would be an advantage
7.	Excellent communication skills, good judgment ability and multi-tasking skills
8.	Proficient with MS Power Point, Excel and Words
9.	Must be able to work under pressure at times to handle a wide variety of activities and confidential matters  
10.	Be responsible, initiative, honest, trustworthy, hard-working and willing to learn, and flexible time
11.	Pleasant personality and good at interpersonal skills
12.	Salary based on experience.

We offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits ,annual leave, as well as excellent career development opportunities in our exciting environment to the right candidate.

Interested parties, please apply with your full resume with covering letter and a current photo, stating current and expected salary, Email to imaginetech@gmail.com
Company Profile:
Uni3 Pawnshop is newly setup and registered as large skill pawnshop in Phnom Penh. Our share holders consist of group of investors from various countries, such as Malaysia and China. 

Our mission is to provide financial assistance to businessman and to raise the living standard in Cambodia. Our vision is to be the no.1 chain-store Pawnshop in Cambodia.

Company Profile:
Canadia Bank Plc. was established on 11th November 1991 as “Canadia Gold & Trust Corporation Ltd.”, joint-venture between Cambodian - Canadians and the National Bank of Cambodia (Central Bank of Cambodia). The bank’s management consisted of former staff of the National Bank of Cambodia and its Cambodian – Canadian shareholders.

The main activities were based on gold transactions, gold plaque manufacturing and lending to local merchants. On 19th April 1993 the name was changed into CANADIA BANK LTD., licensed as a Commercial Bank with the National Bank of Cambodia and registered with the Ministry of Commerce. On 16th December 2003 the name of the bank changed into CANADIA BANK PLC. (Public Limited Company).

Since privatization in 1998 the Bank has become the largest local bank in Cambodia. With a worldwide network of correspondent banking relationships and a solid base of local and international customers CANADIA BANK PLC holds commanding market shares in loans as well as deposits. The bank offers a wide range of financial services through its Head Office and its more than 50 branches in Phnom Penh and major cities throughout the country.

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
The Company: A dynamic importer, wholesaler and distributor of health/organic products located in Australia requires a person who has experience in Accounting, IT maintenance, Inventory, Purchasing Control and Administration. 

We are an Australian owned company with a strong and proud history. We are looking for a person with a high attention to detail, good computer skills and willing to learn and grow with the company. There will be goals and KPIs in this role and we are looking for a candidate with a proven track record. This job offers a long term career path for the correct candidate. Prospects of advancement within the company will be nurtured. If you are a driven A grade student and are able to work unsupervised, then this position is for you.

You will be joining an amazingly talented team in a busy hands on role.  The environment is friendly, target and team focused.  You must display intelligence, enjoy a challenge, and have the ability to learn and grasp procedures; a proven multi-tasking ability is a must. The applicant must be fluent in spoken and written English and English comprehension.

A degree in Accounting / IT (With distinctions), is a must.  

You will be required to work from home. A PC and reliable internet connection is required. You would be required to start at 6.00am Cambodian time to be online with the office on AEST (Australian Eastern Standard Time 9:00 am to 5:00 pm).
Job Requirement:
Please read the entire advertisement, and then address all the key points in your job application. All inquiries should be made via email.
Responsibilities:
•	Accounting, including Writing reports, Looking at costs, Invoicing, Accounts payable / receivables, Scheduled payments, Financial consideration of objectives set by the Company, general ‘number crunching', cash flow projections, Manage IT systems, Manage customer terms and discounts, submit new line forms to various customer groups.
•	Purchasing, including Database Management, Manage product categories, Tracking import orders, Quality control of inwards goods, Forecasting, Reporting, Ordering within time frames and planning, Manage new product lines, Price and delivery expectations
•	Inventory, including Stock control, Financial and sales expectations of short shelf life products, Forecasting, Analyse stock flow trends, Timely management of inwards and outwards goods 
•	Administration, Assist in reps sales planners to organize sales runs.
•	IT – Manage and maintain a windows server. Maintain sales team tablets and assist sales reps.


Skills & Experience needed:
•	Advanced Excel & Excellent Computer skills a must - Only advanced excel users need apply.
•	MYOB or equivalent accounting system experience an advantage.
•	Ability to multitask and work in a fast paced environment
•	Ability to write SQL scripts an advantage.

The Person:
•	Fluent written and verbal English
•	Strong computer and IT skills an advantage
•	Attention to detail and accuracy is paramount
•	Energetic with the desire to learn
•	Highly organised and able to multitask
•	Punctual, reliable, good work ethic
•	Self motivated with a can-do attitude

Hours: Monday to Friday 9.00am – 5.00pm Australian Eastern Standard Time
Salary range: $10,000 - $20,000 AU$ per year + bonuses (depending on skills and experience)
Contact Info: Contact Information Sam  089586729 Phnom Penh  089586729

Job Description:
Summary of position
Our client is a Social Business, a Cambodian handicraft company, produces and sells original proprietary hand made souvenirs. The company, founded in 2011, aims to create a direct link between local vulnerable populations and tourists, offering access to quality jobs to locals and access to original art made in Cambodia for the tourists. The company produces in its workshop in the heart of Siem Reap.

Main Duties and responsibilities
•	To increase the number of visitors to our workshop 
•	To make grow the volume of our sales at the showroom
•	To develop commercial relationships (B2B) and sign deals with third parties such as Hotels, Tour Operators, Tourist Guides, Tuk-Tuk drivers, hotels managers

Reporting
•	To Manager
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree in Sales and Marketing or equivalent
•	Experience in Sales with very good proven S&M track record
•	 Ability to work under pressure and tight delays
•	Good knowledge in MS Office and Google environment

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Company Profile:
Established in 2012, Battambang Agro Industry Co., Ltd. (BAI) is the leading cassava starch processing and distribution company in northwest region of Cambodia.  This state-of-art processing facility, produces three different grades of cassava/tapioca native starch with exporting quality, and has an annual current production capacity of 70,000 MT.

BAI’s Vision is to be the leading native tapioca supplier of the world.  Our Mission is to manufacture high quality products, with the aim to help diversify Cambodia’s agricultural sector and striving to make practice that could help the company to achieve its future vision.

With our expansion plan, we are looking for highly motivated, experienced and calibre individual to lead our company to achieve our vision and mission:

Job Description:
- Establish and oversee an accounting system for recording all transactions and activities happened in the group companies (mainly property development)
- Pro-actively driven in coordinating and analyzing monthly reporting, cash flow forecasts, budgets, financial information and related tax computation of various countries and multiple entities
- Responsible for setting up of financial controls and other internal controls to ensure effective risk management practices
- Streamline, improve and automate processes and systems
- Supervise a team of account staff and co-ordinate the monthly and year-end closing activities including tax returns in a tax-efficient way as per the corporate and statutory reporting timelines
- Provide leadership and coordination in the administration, business and management accounting and financial management of the group companies.
Job Requirement:
- University degree holder major in Accounting/Finance, with minimum 5 years' experience in a Property Developer and multinational corporation. Experience from the Big 4 accountancy firm is a plus
- Sound knowledge of Cambodia Financial Reporting Standards and International Financial Reporting Standards and corporate taxation
- Ability to work collaboratively with multi-cultural business partners and stakeholders and work effectively across functions under tight timelines
- Possess a strong command in written and spoken English and Khmer. Chinese would be an advantage
- Proficient with Microsoft Office 
- Studying and working abroad would be an advantage

Company Profile:
COGETEL Ltd. (ONLINE) is the leading ISP and broadband provider in the country; established in July 1997 by Telstra
Cambodia as Bigpond Cambodia – the first commercial Internet Service Provider in the country. In 2002, Cogetel Limited acquired the business from Telstra marking the beginning of its ADSL service and its new brand name – ONLINE.

ONLINE subsequently brought in WiMAX, Long-range WiFi, and Fiber Optic to increase its range of last miles technology to meet any need of its customers.

ONLINE strives to deliver products and services that are tailored to its customers’ Internet technology needs, easily understood and used, delivered with warmth, knowledge and experience throughout the years. Supported by its core drive of keeping people in touch with their world; ONLINE always brings innovative products and services to Cambodia, thus keeping Cambodia abreast with latest technologies worldwide.

Our uniquely tailored services continue to meet the needs of diverse customers – whether for domestic, corporate, single or multiple users, academic or leisure purposes. Online improves communications with the rest of the world through ideal, reliable and secure connection coupled with excellent support services. ONLINE is connected to the world directly through mainland China, Hong Kong, Thailand, European countries, through redundant fiber optic cable making us the most vigorous ISP in Cambodia with abundant and diverse routes around the world.

Our Mission
To deliver technology solutions to achieve superior operational performance that enables us to provide our customers with exceptional service.

Our Vision
To be the primary internet service provider of choice and ideal company that provides fostering work environment.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin Department HR Manager 016672267 #60, Monivong BLvd, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh  016672267

Company Profile:
Fortune Innovations Training Co., Ltd. is an International Training and Consulting firm in Taiwan, Thailand, and Vietnam. We are expanding our business to Cambodia, Malaysia, Singapore, and the Philippines. We are currently recruiting people with good working habits and strong desire to work with us to prepare for the completion of ASEAN Economy Community in 2015. 

Our main business is as below:

1. Operate and provide services as consultant, agent, to source and administrate (manage) all kinds of Information Technology, including, but limited to, Internet Communication, Mobile Phone Communication, and Electronic Commerce.

To carry on the business of providing Training Programs and Courses of Business Administration, Management, and Career Management, Languages, Academic Subjects, Vocational Skills, either Alone or in Conjunction with other Individuals, Institutions, or Companies and providing Training Programs and Courses related thereto.

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.
